channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Security Update - Catalina
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Security Update - Catalina

item.title: CVE-2020-29622|2024-08-04T16:55:10.588Z -- apple -- security%20update%20-%20catalina
item.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation. This issue is fixed in Security Update 2021-005 Catalina. Mounting a maliciously crafted NFS network share may lead to arbitrary code execution with system privileges.

item.title: CVE-2020-27942|2024-08-04T16:25:44.135Z -- apple -- security%20update%20-%20catalina
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in Security Update 2021-002 Catalina, Security Update 2021-003 Mojave. Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution.
